snippet: Early editions of the Access to Medicine Index focused on infectious and tropical diseases, but the list has been refined to include access to drugs to mental illnesses.
abstract: Access to Medicine Index reports that, for fourth time, GlaxoSmithKline tops its list ranking pharmaceutical companies by how effectively they help the world’s poor get needed medicines.
lead_paragraph: Early editions of the Access to Medicine Index focused on infectious and tropical diseases, but the list has been refined to include access to drugs to mental illnesses.

headline.print_headline: GlaxoSmithKline Leads in Getting Drugs to Poor
headline.main: GlaxoSmithKline Leads In Getting Drugs to Poor
